select saleOrder.id id, saleOrder.id parentId, saleOrder.company_id companyId, saleOrder.order_number orderNumber, saleOrder.sys_code sysCode, saleOrder.receipt_type receiptType, CASE WHEN saleOrder.receipt_type = '1' THEN '不开票' WHEN saleOrder.receipt_type = '2' THEN '普通发票' WHEN saleOrder.receipt_type = '3' THEN '增值税发票' ELSE null END receiptTypeName,
saleOrder.price_type priceType, saleOrder.state state, CASE WHEN saleOrder.state = '0' THEN '待提交' WHEN saleOrder.state = '1' THEN '待审核' WHEN saleOrder.state = '2' THEN '待出库' WHEN saleOrder.state = '3' THEN '待发货' WHEN saleOrder.state = '4' THEN '已发货' WHEN saleOrder.state = '5' THEN '已完成' WHEN saleOrder.state = '-1' THEN '已取消' ELSE null END stateName, saleOrder.make_id makeId, saleOrder.customer_id customerId, DATE_FORMAT(saleOrder.order_date,'%Y-%m-%d') orderDate,
round(ifnull(saleOrder.total_sum, 0),2) totalSum, round(ifnull(saleOrder.discount_sum, 0),2) discountSum, round(ifnull(saleOrder.order_sum, 0),2) orderSum, round(ifnull(saleOrder.advance_sum, 0),2) advanceSum, saleOrder.cuser cuser,
DATE_FORMAT(saleOrder.cdate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') cdate, saleOrder.uuser uuser, DATE_FORMAT(saleOrder.udate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') udate, saleOrder.remark remark, saleOrder.isdisable isdisable, DATE_FORMAT(saleOrder.expect_date,'%Y-%m-%d') expectDate,
makeUser.user_name makeName, customer.name customerName,
customerInvoice.company_name custInvoiceCompanyName, customerInvoice.invoice_number custInvoiceNumber, customerInvoice.address custInvoiceAddress, customerInvoice.bank_name custInvoiceBankName, customerInvoice.bank_code custInvoiceBankCode, customerInvoice.phone custInvoicePhone, customerInvoice.mobile custInvoiceMobile,
round(ifnull(receive.receive_sum, 0), 2) receiveSum,
round(ifnull(invoice.invoice_sum, 0), 2) invoiceSum,
round(ifnull(deliver.deliver_sum, 0), 2) deliverSum from view_sale_order_by_invoice saleOrder left join vmes_customer customer on saleOrder.customer_id = customer.id left join vmes_user makeUser on saleOrder.make_id = makeUser.id left join vmes_customer_invoice customerInvoice on saleOrder.customer_id = customerInvoice.customer_id and customerInvoice.isdefault = '1'
left join view_sale_receive_detail receive on saleOrder.id = receive.order_id
left join view_sale_invoice_detail invoice on saleOrder.id = receive.order_id
left join ( select order_id, sum(sum) deliver_sum from vmes_sale_deliver_detail where state = '1' group by order_id ) deliver on saleOrder.id = deliver.order_id
and saleOrder.company_id = #{currentCompanyId}
and saleOrder.state = #{state}
and saleOrder.sys_code = #{sysCode}
and saleOrder.order_number = #{orderNumber}
and customer.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT(#{customerName}),'%')
order by ${orderStr}
